description: This file defines a front-end component 'NotesHome' using LightningJS, for a notes application. It structures the UI layout, manages state including loading notes, and defines methods for user interactions such as creating new notes and selection handling.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: A LightningJS component that serves as the main page for displaying a list of notes and an editor, including header and layout elements.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of a note from the notes list, updating the current selected note ID.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and updates the selected note ID to the new note.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Changes button color on hover to indicate interactivity.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Restores button color when hover ends.
